text: Phira'aina ne kiha tusim meri agi'a tom' binham isa nu mana li'a ki iha hi tuhada vada hai, jisa ne tuhanu jadu sikha'i'a hai tam huna maim tuhade hatha paira ulati'am disavam vica katavanvaga ate mai' tuhanu khajura de tani'am upara phahe lavanga. Ate tusim jana lavauge ki sade vicom kisa di saza zi'ada daradanaka hai ate zi'ada dera taka rahina vali hai
